name: African Terrestrial Fibre Network Mapping Project (AfTerFibre)

platformIndependence.pltIndependenceDesc: The data is available in a variety of open GIS formats including SHP, KML, and GeoJSON which can be integrated into a variety of open source GIS tools ranging from desktop tools like QGIS to online mapping tools like Leaflet and others.

privacyComplianceList: I am unaware of any privacy law this project might violate.  It contains no PII data
adherenceSteps: I am unaware of any international or domestic laws that might apply.

preventHarm.additionalInfoMechanismProcessesPolicies: The fibre optic projects documented are implemented by large corporations that are more than well-equipped to defend their interests.

inappropriateIllegalContent.type: Yes, it collects maps of terrestrial fibre optic projects in African countries.

deploymentCountries: The project collects data from all African countries
